data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Melo, María Cecilia (2008): New records of Peruvian Reduviidae (Heteroptera), with the description of a new species of Tagalis Stål 1860 (Saicinae). Zootaxa 1763: 55-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181977
